generatePDF

void generatePDF(Source source,
                 Transformer transformer,
                 org.apache.fop.apps.FOUserAgent userAgent,
                 OutputStream os)
                 throws TransformerException,
                        org.apache.fop.apps.FOPException,
                        IOException
Generates a PDF

Parameters:
source - Source data.
transformer - Transformer to use (optional).
userAgent - User agent to apply (optional).
os - Destination output stream.
Throws:
TransformerException - if an error occurs.
org.apache.fop.apps.FOPException - if an error occurs.
IOException - if an error occurs.
